Someone said that DLP isn't a question of bruteforce

M = 57896044618658097711785492504343953926634992332820282019728792003956564819949

A = 14161420410763001448816212701340128723533258540833815751811061403340

B = 42213363621246508108494292384145544030734978132072549363449116578020

P = (2190248018051989956472619617791626715005280492523541911739946514875103078067, 19448706653213292050873085972940750247246047387161810042831875227208085896637)

n*P = (20528936384709068112298633777021018789224348849879321669322477743368701819103, 12635880375022965242078107073478989240347439084073440889501039736944635415290)

the FLAG is the VALUE of n 
(n < 5000000000000000000000000000)
